<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/users/me/stats"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve usage statistics for the currently authenticated user, including bookmark counts by type, top domains, tag usage, bookmarking activity patterns, and storage usage.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
